00020 struct TreeEntry* createTable(char* name){
00021     struct TreeEntry *table = malloc(sizeof(struct TreeEntry));
00022     table->name =(char*)malloc(MAX_KEY_LEN*sizeof(char)); 
00023     table->value =(char*)malloc(MAX_VALUE_LEN*sizeof(char));
00024     strcpy(table->name, name);
00025     table->tree = createTreeDB();

00033 void deleteTable(struct TreeEntry* table)
00034 {
00035         if(table == NULL)
00036                 return;
00037 
00038         if(table->name != NULL)
00039         {
00040                 free(table->name);
00041                 table->name = NULL;
00042         }
00043 
00044         if(table->value != NULL)
00045         {
00046                 free(table->value);

00049 
00050         if(table->tree != NULL)
00051         {
00052                 deleteTreeDB(table->tree);
00053                 free(table->tree);
00054                 table->tree = NULL;
00055         }
00056 }
